snippet.title: Just Crow Things - Official Trailer | Women Led Games
snippet.description: Watch as a crow gets into mischief, like stealing items, leading a pack of goats, pooping on humans, and more mayhem in this latest Just Crow Things trailer. Just Crow Things will be available on PC, Xbox, PlayStation, and Nintendo Switch. In Just Crow Things, you're a little crow trying to prove herself to the world. Make new animal friends, poop on unsuspecting hoomans, and steal all the shiny trinkets! Each level is a little sandbox full of fun items to discover and puzzles to solve, while leaving a bit of chaos behind. Why? Just caws!
